rounds.response:
Analyze:
- Board: 7♥ 3♦ 6♦ – rainbow, very low and somewhat connected; a 9 or 4 would give a straight. A♠ 8♦ is unpaired, has two overcards and a gut-shot to the straight (needs 5).  
- Pot is 40 and both villains checked to me.  
- Estimating: any 8 gives me top-pair and an 8-kicker; any A gives top-pair top-kicker; the gut-shot draw has ~4-outer (4 × 4 = ~16 % with two streets). Villains’ checks could be weak, or they might be slow-playing sets/straight draws.  
- My stack is 980; a flop cbet of around 70-80 % pot (~30-35) is classic, representing an overpair/top pair for fold equity and building a larger pot when I improve.

Decision:
Bet 30 to apply pressure and collect dead money against missed overcards or draws.

[Bet 30]
